about_the_game:
The Adventure of Rikka is a top down 2D action RPG with a focus on puzzles, exploration, secrets and collectibles.
You must defeat the dark forces that has cursed the lands, fight enemies using your sword and an arsenal of items such as the bow and fire wand and save the kingdom!

Fight Enemies!


Solve Puzzles!


Find all the secrets!


  • 7 Dungeons with challenging boss-fights, and many smaller puzzle dungeons.
  • 10 Unique player items such as the Bow, Bomb, Grappling hook, Pegasus boots and the Fire wand.
  • Upgradeable items and weapons.
  • Shards and Stones of Power scattered across the land which are used to upgrade your stats.
  • A bunch of side quests.


The kingdom of Delheed had been a peaceful land for a hundred years, lush forests, roaring mountains and pristine beaches.

One day there was a storm... no villager had ever seen a storm before, they all huddled inside their homes in shear confusion. After the storm had passed the lands were no longer what they used to be... The volcano on the mountain had erupted, clouds of choking gas covered the woods, and the water in the old forest had been turned toxic! There were strange beasts and monsters roaming the outdoors and because of the 100 year peace, no one was ready for this.

The kingdom had not always been a peaceful place, over a hundred years ago there was a forgotten event that took place to thwart the darkness and bring in prosperity and peace. The king called all willing to stand up for their kingdom to once again banish the curse which laid upon the land.

This is where your story begins, you've been reclusively living in the forest your entire life, the adventure of Rikka starts now...
